title: Mars in Pisces
summary: Drive diffuses into intuition, compassion, and imagination. Action is guided by feeling and ideals, sometimes drifting without a clear map. The opportunity is to pair sensitivity with gentle but real momentum.

meaning.headline: Energy moves fluidly, motivated by empathy and vision.

frames.text: Mars in Pisces channels effort into creative, spiritual, or compassionate pursuits.
Actions follow intuition and the desire to ease suffering.
Flow states and daydreams may shape direction.
Soft approaches can be surprisingly effective.
Going with the flow means avoiding accountability or boundaries.

frictions: Taking on others’ pain and losing focus
opportunities: Restorative movement like yoga or swimming

do: Set small, heartfelt goals for the day.
Use timers or partners to keep momentum.
Translate intuition into a first concrete step.
avoid: Agreeing to tasks out of guilt
Promising more than you can give

reusable_lines.text: Let compassion move you—and let boundaries steer you.
A small, inspired step counts more than drifting.

allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can soften motivation and invite creativity
Agency-forward language: you choose how to act on intuition
Contextual framing: gentleness helps when paired with clarity

sources: Mars as drive/assertion archetype in daily cycles
